title: Did celebrity leader Guy Ferry feed 5,000 people evacuated from California to wildfires?
subtitle: The numbers are not quite clear, but the food network star has definitely coordinated a major relief effort in Redding, California, over a two-day period.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The celebrity chef Guy Ferry, or helped feed, 5,000 people displaced by the Car 2018 fire in Shasta County, California.
